channel.title: cseti on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cseti on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Didn't see much
item.description: 03:35 Sunday 22 November 2015 JST But the weather was reasonably warm for the season. Quite overcast, though we saw the moon peek through a few times. haha remember PEEK and POKE in BASIC? Lance and I were just in the free massage chairs for around an hour after we bathed in the 24 hour お風呂. My massage chair inflated balloons at various points, whereas I think his used rollers to massage.

item.title: Heading out to ET contact in Kiyosato
item.description: 12:11 Saturday 21 November 2015 JST Haha I just realized I haven’t taken a shower since the night before last. I’m on Nambu Line headed to Tachikawa, at which point I’ll have about 20 minutes to get a ticket for the next train. Hopefully the ticket line will be shorter than in Kawasaki!

item.title: Mt Mitake ET Contact Event
item.description: 02:59 Sunday 19 April 2015 JST We saw lots of orbs via flash photos, but didn’t seem to notice any anomalous stuff in the sky.

item.title: en route to Pyramid meditation center
item.description: ##16:33 Saturday 21 February 2015 JST## Lin walked with me to Kawasaki station and waved byeeee as I headed down the steps to the train. In 東神奈川 station, I got some snacks and headed down to the platform, from where I saw two excited kids on the train at the next platform. They were looking around to see what they could see, so I waved to them and they waved back and said whatever they said about some stranger waving to them.

item.title: Pyramid Meditation Center ET Contact event
item.description: ##02:38 Sunday 22 February 2015 JST## We had a few beeps from the radar detector, a few squeaks from the magnetometer, and several orbs in photos taken by Esther. I’m sleeping down in the meditation room under the pyramid.

item.title: ET Contact weekend
item.description: ##12:27 Saturday 17 January 2015 JST## On the train now headed to something-Ichinomiya station in Chiba. Should arrive in Chiba station at 12:36 and then I’ll hop onto another train for 40 minutes or so. ##19:04 Saturday 17 January 2015 Great food at Boba cafe in Ishinomia. Artist Hannah Sata had some great pieces up in the loft. Yeah, I can see how the guy last night said mine look like amateur toys.

item.title: CSETI Chichibu 22 Nov 2014
item.description: ##23:08 Saturday 22 November 2014 JST## Out in the field, we did meditation, then a visualization to show the ETs where we are located. We saw a few falling stars, but nothing else obvious. I’m writing now because I just came back to the cabin to get the main laser pointer. ##02:55 Sunday 23 November 2014 JST## We just arrived back in our cabin. Saw lots of flashes in the sky, like the whole sky lit up just for a twentieth or 100th of a second, about maybe 20 times over the course of nearly 5 hours we were out there.

item.title: Early wakup
item.description: ##08:30 Sunday 23 November 2014 JST## Moe joe my back hurts, possibly from having been looking up at the sky for hours last night. Four guys in this cabin; one has already completely packed and made his bed (he used to be in military, apparently). Another guy is nearly packed, and another is taking a shower, And I’m just here type type typing with all my shit still unpacked hahaha.

item.title: Pre meeting
item.description: ##18:39 Saturday 22 November 2014 JST## Rohini is here! Inelia Benz interviewed by Bill Ryan also talking about breatharians Delores Cannon (the convoluted universe) ##19:52 Mark is going through the second presentation ##21:11 大風呂 (hot baths) were nice! We’re about to put on warm clothes and head out to the field.
